io.amcp.core

Class AbstractAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.AbstractAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Serializable

    public abstract class AbstractAgent
extends Object
implements Agent
    Abstract base implementation of the Agent interface. Provides common functionality and state management for all agents.
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractAgent(AgentID agentId, String agentType)
      Constructor for creating an agent with a specific ID and type.
      protected AbstractAgent(String agentType)
      Constructor for creating an agent with a specific type (generates random ID).
